### Performance (Backend)

```
BEFORE:
Event Processing:
â”œâ”€ ~10-12 discrete event frames
â”œâ”€ Multiple rapid updates per frame
â”œâ”€ 5x scattered C_Timer calls
â””â”€ Manual event wire-up

AFTER (Full implementation):

â”œâ”€ ~4-5 event frames (consolidated)
â”œâ”€ Batched updates (0.05s-0.1s)

â””â”€ AceBucket-managed events
```
